They don't own a house so they live with family.  Maria works doing rural activities such as raising animals like guinea pigs, chickens, and cattle.  The agriculture is for home consumption.  Her strongest business is embroidery, which she learned through natural ability and practice.  She will use the money from the loan to buy chickens, guinea pigs, animal feed, and fabric.  Her goal is to continue to prosper and to have a business such as a shop.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs, animal feed, and fabric

loans.name: Muhammed's Group

texts.en:
Muhammed is a hard working Iraqi man. He is 34 years old, married and a father of 3 children.

He has 10 years experience selling fruits and vegetables, a business he would like to improve by purchasing his own 3-wheeled motorcycle wagon, which will allow him to pick up and transport his goods without involving others who usually charge a high price for the work. Cutting out the 'middle man' will allow Muhammed to choose and purchase the fresh goods directly from the growers and will give him a better opportunity to sell and improve his income from the business. 

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group. 

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for their protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support for Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to purchase a 3 wheeled motorcycle wagon

loans.name: Nataiyuang

texts.en:
Nataiyuag is 31 years old, married to Rareu and supports a family of eight members. Her children are aged between six and 22 years. She is a mixed farmer and she has run her business for the last ten years. Her monthly income is KES 10000.

Nataiyuag is currently servicing her fourth loan from KADET of KES 80000 that will facilitate her to prepare the land and buy planting seedlings. She plans to use the anticipated profits to diversify into livestock farming. Her future dream is to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and prepare land for cultivation.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a 29-year-old lady from Nyahururu. She is married to a business man known as James and together they are blessed with two children aged 10 and 6 years old.

She owns a mini boutique where she sells ladies jewellery like earrings, bangles, neck chains, inner wares and other beauty products and accessories. She has been running this business for the past year. With her first loan of Ksh 20,000 from Kadet Ltd she would like to buy more stock of these items to sell.

Her monthly income right now is Kshs. 8,000, and she plans to use the increased profits of her business to educate her children, expand her business and to open another business.

She hopes that the future of her business and her family will be prosperous.

loans.use: To buy more stocks of ladies jewellery to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anna Rebeca

texts.es: Anna de 32 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijo de 7 años. Tiene 20 años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa nueva dentro del mercado  central del municipio. Anna es muy conocida y bien recomendada en la zona. Su principal patrimonio es su casa que con muchas dificultades ha levantado junto a su esposo.  Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, polines y clavos para  reparar el techo de su humilde casa el cual se encuentra dañada y cuando llueve sus pocas pertenencias se humedecen.
texts.en:
Anna is 32 years old. She lives with her husband and seven year old son. For 20 years she has sold new clothing in the municipality's central market. Anna is well known and respected in the area.

Her principal asset is her house which with great difficulties she built with her husband. Anna is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, trusses and nails to repair the roof of her modest house. The roof is damaged and their few possessions get wet when it rains.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, trusses and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Masika

texts.en:
Masika operates a charcoal-selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces stiff competition from other fellow operators in her business, and she appreciates the support of the previous loan which helped her to boost her business.

With this 40,000 Kenyan shilling loan, she wants to purchase five sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase five sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Sherafkan

texts.ru: Шерафхан позитивный и ответственный мужчина. Он женат и имеет одного ребёнка. Он живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Но пока им приходится жить в родительском доме. Но Шерафхан очень хочет построить для своей семьи свой собственный дом, чтобы жить там и растить своих детей. Жена Шерафхана домохозяйка, она очень трудолюбивая и заботливая мама. Сам Шерафхан работает плотником. От этого дела он получает хороший доход, но его недостаточно, чтобы позволить себе другие расходы, например строительство нового дома. Этого дохода хватает лишь только на пропитание. С помощью своих братьев, которые работают в России, Шерафхан смог купить себе земельный участок, и теперь ему необходимы денежные средства, чтобы закупить все необходимые материалы для строительства дома. Поэтому Шерафхан обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Шерафхан надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Sherafkan is a positive and a responsible man.  He is married and has a child.  He lives with his family in a small village.  For now, they have to live in their parents' home.  Sherafkan wants, very much, to build a house for his own family.  Sherafkan's wife is a hardworking homemaker and a caring mother.  Sherafkan works as a carpenter.  This job provides a good income, however, it is not enough to cover extra expenses, such as building a new house.  This income is only enough to pay for the food expenses.  

With the help of his brothers, who work in Russia, Sherafkan was able to purchase a plot of land.  Now, he needs the financial means to buy all of the necessary building materials to build a house.  This is the reason why Sherafkan applied to Arvand for a loan to purchase building materials.  Sherafkan is hoping for a successful outcome and thanks Arvand, in advance, for their support.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build his house

loans.name: Genya

texts.en:
Genya is 56 years old and she lives in the village of Khashtarak which is in Tavush region. Genya is a widow. She has two sons and one of them is already married and lives separately with his family. 

Genya works as a teacher at the local school, but her family mainly relies on income from farming. In her small farm she has three rotund piglets and twenty chickens. She mainly sells eggs from her house and from time to time also some poultry and pork. She also cultivates tomatoes and cucumbers, beans and onions. She says her work and farming income has helped her to cover of her family’s needs and also to organize her son’s wedding party. 

She asks a loan of 1.100.000 Armenian drams in order to develop her farm, to buy two cows and a lot of animal fodder.

loans.use: to buy two cows and a lot of animal fodder

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам житель района Темурмалик, ему 30 лет. У него высшее бухгалтерское образование. Рустам женат и имеет троих детей. Старшему сыну 7 лет, он ходит в школу. Младшему сыну 2 года, дочке 4 года. Около 4 лет Рустам занимается скотоводством. Мало мужчин такого возраста берут на себя такую деятельность и справляются с ними на ура. Но Рустаму нравится разводить скот и поэтому он выбрал этот путь. У Рустама сейчас один теленок, его вы можете увидеть на фотографии. Рустам хочет закупить несколько таких телят и увеличить поголовье скота в своем скотном дворе. Рустам нуждается в финансировании с вашей стороны. Помогите ему купить телят!
texts.en: Rustam is 30 years old and is a resident of Temurmalik.  He has a degree in accounting.  Rustam is married and has three children.  His oldest son is 7 years old and attends school.  His youngest son is 2 years old, and his daughter is 4 years old.  For about 4 years, Rustam has been raising cattle.  Few men of his age take on such a task and cope as successfully with it as he has.  Rustam selected this work because he enjoys raising cattle.  Currently, Rustam has one calf, which you can see in the photograph.  Rustam wants to purchase a few more calves for breeding.  Rustam needs your financial help.  Help him buy calves!

loans.use: To purchase calves for breeding

loans.name: Parviz

texts.ru: Парвиз молодой и энергичный молодой человек. Ему 20 лет. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Парвиз является студентом 1 курса Национального Университета Исследования Российской Федерации. Перед тем как он поступил в университет, он окончил технический лицей своего района по специальности информационная система. Его родители занимаются скотоводством. Они в основном откармливают крупно -рогатого скота. Его родители не в состоянии оплатить за учебный договор. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1750 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Parviz is an energetic young man of 20. He is not married and lives with his parents. Parvis is a first-year student at a national research university of the Russian Federation. Before enrolling in university, he graduated from a technical school in his region with a specialty in information systems. His parents work as cattle farmers, primarily fattening big-horned cattle, and are unable to pay for his tuition. He is requesting a loan of 1,750 USD to pay for his university tuition. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition

loans.name: Siah

texts.en:
Siah lives in New Kru town which is one of the oldest communities in Liberia. Living conditions there are bit difficult due to the high rate of crime, fewer bathrooms,  filthy conditions, and overpopulation, but the most interesting part is that rooms are bit cheaper, there are options for traveling, and the community contains one of the biggest markets in Liberia and less expensive rates of food. 

Siah, 45 years old, is married to a security man. They have four children, ages between 17 and 23. For the past 15 years now, Siah has been selling rice, pepper, oil, vita, etc. She started this business with a little money which she got from her husband's earnings. Siah says she enjoys the buying from her customers and the money she generates from her business every day. 

Siah is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, pepper, oil, vita, etc. for her business. She plans to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, oil, vita, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en:
Dennis is a 30-year-old motorcycle operator in Maweni Mombasa, and has been doing this for the last three years. He is a single man who currently does not support anyone.

This marks his third loan from KADET Ltd to finance his business. He will use the loan to purchase a new motorbike for his business and employ one person. He will use the anticipated profit to service his loan. He hopes to own several motorcycles in the future and to live a successful life.

loans.use: to purchase his second motorcycle

loans.name: Rafi

texts.en:
Rafi is a 48-year-old Lebanese married man. He has worked as a car mechanic for the past 35 years. He started to work in this type of business at a very young age as he was obliged to cooperate with his parents financially, seeing the really bad situation that the family has passed though. 

And today, Rafi is a talented mechanic and responsible for a family composed of his wife and three children, who are attending school. 

With the loan he requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, Rafi will purchase specific machinery that will remarkably ease his repair operations.  It will allow him to identify damage quickly, and then he will better serve his customers. 

In the future, Rafi intends to trade in spare auto parts and expand his business into other areas.

loans.use: to purchase specific auto-repair machinery

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is the married mother of six children. She lives in her own house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for her children. 

For the past ten years, she has operated a fruit-selling business. She sells to her neighbors and passersby. Her major business challenge is stiff competition from other fruits sellers. 

With the KES 30,000, she wants to purchase sacks of fruits at wholesale for resale at a profit. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fruits at wholesale for resale at a profit.

loans.name: Bushra's Group

texts.en:
Bushra is a young, 28-year-old, Iraqi woman. She is married and a mother of three children. With limited career options due to cultural restrictions and domestic constraints, Bushra is one of the many Iraqi women who is working from home, using her sewing skills to generate some income and participate in meeting the financial needs of her family.

Bushra has ten years of experience with the small, home-based sewing business activity, making custom-ordered dresses for women and children, as well as other small fabric household items. She would like to buy a new sewing machine and a small generator, both of which will allow her to work more comfortably, be able to better plan her work hours, instead of waiting for the government power, and create better quality products for her customers. To be able to afford the purchases, she is taking a small loan from Relief International Microfinance Iraq. 

Relief International Microfinance Iraq offers 'group loans' for clients unable to provide a guarantor, thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of three to five clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group. 

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for her protection. Relief International - Microfinance Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support for Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and a small generator.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is from Olkalou and she is 43 years old. She is married to Joseph who is a farmer and they are blessed with four children aged 23, 18, 14 and 11 years old.

Elizabeth is a farmer who grows different types of foods like maize, beans, potatoes, vegetables and wheat. This is an occupation she has been in for the last 20 years. Elizabeth has applied for her first loan of KES 20,000 from KADET which will enable her to buy planting seeds and fertilizers for the next planting season.

From her farming activities, Elizabeth realizes a monthly income of KES 35,000 and she intends to use the anticipated profits from her expanded business to pay her loan back to KADET and to pay school fees for her children.

Elizabeth hopes and dreams of a successful business and a healthy family in the future.

loans.use: to buy planting seeds and fertilizers to be used on her farm for increased yields.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 30 years old and lives in the town of Nakaloke in the Mbale region of Uganda. He is married and has two children, who are currently in school. 

For the past 10 years, James has been working hard to manage his retail shop, which sells sugar, soap, and salt. 

To help expand his business, James has requested a loan of UGX 2,000,000 from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more items for the shop to sell.  It will help James to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. 

James hopes that in the future he will be able to increase his stock and will also be able to borrow more money from Brac. 

James is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like James who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.


"

loans.use: to purchase more items for his shop to sell

loans.name: Maitta

texts.en:
Maitta lives and works in New-Kru-Town of Liberia, which is poor in living conditions. Miatta is married to a driver. They have four children between 3 and  22. Only two are currently attending school and live at home. 

Maitta was unfortunate in not being able to attend school, but she started a business selling coal ten years ago. With the loan proceeds, she will buy more coal for her business. 

She started this business with a little money from her husband, and she learned the business from a friend. She enjoys how fast her coal always sells. 

Her dream is to open a bigger shop business.

loans.use: to buy more coal for her business.

loans.name: Hasanboi

texts.ru:
Хасанбой трудолюбивый, добрый человек. Ему 32 года. Женат. Имеет двоих прекрасных детей. Хасанбой очень любит свою семью, ценит то что имеет. Жена Хасанбоя домохозяйка, занимается воспитанием детей и помогает мужу по хозяйству. Хасанбой любит природу, любит работать на поле в свежем воздухе.  Еще он занимаеться откармливанием  крупно рогатых скатов. Но в данное время у него их несколько, Хасанбой хотел бы увеличить своих скотов. Зимой планирует  откормить  их а к весну продать. Но для этого ему не хватает денежные средства. Поэтому он подал заявку на кредит. 
На полученный кредит Хасанбой планирует купить несколько голов скота и увеличить свое стадо. По словам Хасанбоя, он доверяет  "Арванд" и надеется на поддержку организации.
texts.en: Hasanboi is a hard working and a kind man.  He is 32 years old, married and has two wonderful children.  Hasanboi loves his family very much and appreciates what he has.  Hasanboi's wife is a homemaker, who is raising their children and is helping her husband with housework.  Hasanboi loves the outdoors and he loves to work in a open field, in the fresh air.  He raises cattle, however, currently, he has only a few in number.  Hasanboi wants to increase their number.  He plans to use the winter to fatten them and then sell them by the springtime, but he does not have the financial means to do so.  This is the reason why he is applying for a loan.  Hasanboi is planning to use this loan to purchase a few additional cattle and to increase his herd.  In Hasanboi's words, he trusts Arvand and is hoping to receive support of this organization.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Dorris

texts.en:
Dorris lives in New-Kru-Town, which is one of the oldest communities in Liberia. She is married to a doctor. They have three children between 8 to 11 years old who are currently attending school and living at home. She stopped her education at the sixth grade. 

She started a table market business where she sells underwear, toothpaste, soap, etc., in the local market. With the loan proceeds she will buy enough underwear, toothpaste, soap, etc., to increase her sales. Her problem is too few goods on her table. She got money from her husband to establish this business 10 years ago, and she learned by watching other businesswomen. She enjoys the flows of customers. 

Her plan is to move from a table business to a shop business.

loans.use: to buy enough underwear, toothpaste, soap, etc., to increase her sales.

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es: Cruz de 41 años de edad habita junto a su grupo familiar en casa de su propiedad desde hace 35 años de edad.  Su principal fuente de ingresos es  la venta de lácteos (queso, crema y requesón). Para ella lo más importante es su familia y busca todas las oportunidades de brindar mejores condiciones. Desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que con el tiempo y las lluvias la han deteriorado y es necesario repararlo para evitar la filtración de las lluvias. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en  la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos. De esta forma espera  poder brindar a su familia condiciones más seguras.
texts.en: Cruz, who is 41-years old, has lived together with her family group in a house on her property for the last 35 years.  Her main source of income is selling dairy products (cheese, cream and cottage cheese).  The most important thing to Cruz is her family, and she looks for every opportunity to give them better living conditions.  She wants to replace the roof on her dwelling, as time and the rains have deteriorated it.  She needs to repair it to keep the rains from coming in.  Cruz is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails.  She will then be able to offer her family safer living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to repair her dwelling's roof.

loans.name: Josselyn Yaneth

texts.es: Josselyn de 21 años de edad habita en casa muy humilde junto a su hijo de un año y su compañero de vida. Ella es muy trabajadora y todos los días se levanta muy temprano para preparar todos los ingredientes para la elaboración de sabrosos tamales (comida típica, preparada a base de masa de maíz, verduras y pollo) que luego sale a vender en las diferentes zonas de su comunidad. Su principal patrimonio es su casa que  con muchos esfuerzos van mejorando junto a su compañero de vida. Solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra de lámina, madera y clavos  para hacer el cambio del techo que actualmente se encuentra dañado. Espera poder contar con este apoyo y hacer la reparación lo antes posible.
texts.en: Josselyn, who is 21-years old, lives in a very humble home with her 1-year old son and her life partner.  She is very hard-working and gets up very early every morning to prepare the ingredients for making her delicious "tamales" (a local dish made with corn meal, vegetables and chicken).  She later goes out to sell her "tamales" in different areas of her community.  Josselyn's main asset is her house.  She and her partner are putting in a lot of hard work to improve it.  Josselyn is requesting this loan from FUSIA to invest in the purchase of sheet metal, wood and nails to replace her roof, which is currently damaged.  Josselyn hopes she can count on this support and make the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase sheet metal, wood and nails to replace her roof.

loans.name: Mirsalim

texts.ru: Мирсалим жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 45 лет. Он женат и имеет пятерых детей. У него очень дружная семья. Живут они в сельской местности. Чтобы иметь доход в семье, все члены семьи пытаются как-то зарабатывать деньги. Каждый трудится как может. Сам Мирсалим работает разнорабочим. От этой работы он получает средний доход. Его дети, сыновья также стараются подрабатывать, чтобы помогать своему отцу кормить их большую семью. Основным и стабильным бизнесом Мирсалима является животноводство. Он разводит и продаёт скот. В этом деле ему помогает жена. Она ухаживает за скотом, а также продаёт полученное от скота молоко. Бизнес животноводства приносит Мирсалиму хороший и стабильный доход. Поэтому он желает расширить этот бизнес. Ему необходимо купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Для этого Мирсалим обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он надеется, что этот бизнес будет успешно расширяться и приносить больше прибыли, чтобы качественно удовлетворять нужды семьи. Мирсалим заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Mirsalim is a cheerful man of 45 years old.  He is married and has five children.  He has a very close-knit family.  They live in the countryside.  To make ends meet, everyone in the family pitches in.  Everyone is working as hard as they can.  Mirsalim works as a handyman. From this type of work, he makes a good income.  His sons also take on various jobs to help their father and to feed their large family.  

The main source of income for Mirsalim is cattle raising.  He breeds and sells cattle.  His wife is helping him with this work.  She takes care of cattle and sells the milk that they produce.  Business of cattle raising provides a good and stable source of income.  This is why Mirsalim wishes to expand his business.  He needs to by a few more heads of cattle for raising and selling.  To achieve this, Mirsalim applied to Arvand for a loan to purchase cattle.  He is hoping that his business will successfully expand and will bring more profits that will satisfy all of his family's necessities. Mirsalim thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Makhfirat

texts.ru:
Махфират 53 года, живет в селе Хамадони. В местной школе она работает учительницей. Из-за маленькой зарплаты Махфират берет заказы для шитья одежды. Такая работа приносит ей дополнительные средства. Она  научилась шить у мамы, и в течение 10 лет пользуется таким ремеслом. Махфират замужем, имеет 5 детей. Две ее дочери учатся в институте, один сын работает в своем дилерском центре. 
Вышивальная машинка, которой пользуется Махфират, совсем старая. Она уже много раз ее ремонтировала. Поэтому Махфират обратилась за кредитом, чтобы приобрести новую швейную машинку. Тогда она сможет шить быстрее и брать больше заказов. Махфират надеется на Вашу отзывчивость!
texts.en:
Makhfirat is 53 years old and she lives in the town of Hamadoni.  She works as a teacher at the local school.  Owing to her small salary, Makhfirat takes orders for sewing clothes.  This works provides additional income for her.  She learned how to sew from her mother and has been sewing professionally for over 10 years.  Makhfirat is married and has five children.  Her two daughters are studying at the institute, and her one son works at a car dealership.  

The sewing machine that Makhfirat now uses is very old and has been repaired multiple times.  Makhfirat applied for a loan to purchase a new sewing machine, with which, she will be able to sew faster and take on more clients.  Mahfirat is hoping for your support!

loans.use: To purchase a new sewing machine to expand her business

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 45-year-old Lebanese man living with his wife and two children, who are still attending school. 

Some 23 years ago, he decided to start his career working as a blacksmith. And in 2006, after gaining the needed experience and becoming an expert in his profession, Hasan opened his own repair shop. He specializes in repairing cars from the outside, and he is pretty talented at his job. 

Today, he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay his children’s educational fees, as his business income is barely enough to cover the family's total living expenses. 

His main objective is to guarantee them a good education until they graduate and then allow them to fit into good professional places to earn a good income and live contentedly.

loans.use: to pay his children’s educational fees

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: María de 52 años de edad,  vive en casa propia desde hace 30 años junto a su querida familia. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tales como faldas, vestidos, blusas, y pantalones. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su comunidad. Es muy conocida como una mujer responsable, emprendedora y visionaria. Desea reparar el techo de su vivienda ya que en la actualidad se encuentra dañado y el agua se filtra dañando sus pocas pertenencias. Esta es la razón por la  cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera para hacer las mejoras necesarias en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Maria is 52 years old and has lived in her own home for 30 years, alongside her dear family. She makes a living by selling clothes, like skirts, dresses, blouses and trousers. She works as a travelling saleswoman in the different areas of her community. Maria is very well-known as a responsible, entrepreneurial and visionary woman.

Maria wants to repair the roof of her home, since it is currently damaged. Water leaks into the home, damaging the family's few possessions. This is the reason why Maria is requesting this loan from FUSAI - in order to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheeting, nails, and wood, to make the necessary improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails, and wood to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Angela Isabel

texts.es: Ángela de 42 años de edad, vive junto a su compañero de vida sus tres hijos de 15 años, de 13 años y de 10 años de edad. Habita en condiciones muy humildes que con su trabajo y el de su compañero de vida van saliendo adelante. Ella se dedica a la venta de fruta fresca  de forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su comunidad. Su deseo es poder hacer algunas mejoras en su vivienda tales como reparar el techo de uno de los dormitorios y hacer la instalación del cableado eléctrico para la introducción de este vital servicio básico. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos así como para hacer la instalación de luz eléctrica.
texts.en:
Angela is 42 years old, and lives with her life partner and their three children, who are 15, 13, and 10 years old. She lives a very humble life, and her and her partner's incomes allow them to get by. Angela earns money by selling fresh fruit at a mobile stand in various parts of her community. 

Angela's desire is to make some improvements to her home, such as repairing the roof over one of the bedrooms, and to install cabling for electricity, in order to have this vital basic service. She has requested this loan from FUSAI to use for the purchase of galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails, and to install electric light.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to repair the roof over bedrooms, and to install electric light.

loans.name: Norma Estela

texts.es: Norma de 35 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su familia.  Se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora y visionaria.  Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada dentro de su hogar de residencia. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de ella y de sus productos ya que son de calidad y a buen precio.  Desea hacer algunas mejoras a su vivienda ya que con el tiempo se está deteriorando. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento y arena para repellar las paredes de su casa, actualmente es de adobe y evitar que se sigan dañando con las lluvias.
texts.en:
Norma is 35 years old, and lives in her own house with her family. She describes herself as being enterprising and forward-thinking. She earns a living by selling new and used clothing from her home. Many people speak well of her, and her products are of good quality and sold at a good price.

Norma wishes to make some improvements to her home, which, over time, has deteriorated. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to purchase cement and sand to plaster the walls of her home, which are made of adobe, which will prevent further damage from the rainy weather.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand to plaster the walls of her house. The exisiting walls are made of adobe.

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema has been operating a clothes-selling business. She sells to town dwellers, passersby, and neighbors. She faces the major challenge of inflation in her business and she appreciates the support of the previous loan. 

With the KSHS 50,000, she wants to purchase two bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase two bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Pargev

texts.en:
Pargev is 30 years old and lives with his small family in the village of Goght, which is in the Kotayk region. He is married and has a small daughter. His wife does not work but takes care of their house and child. Pargev is a very laborious farmer. He is engaged in bee keeping (he sells perfect and pure honey from his house), he has a greenhouse where he cultivates tomatoes that he plans to sell during winter months, a small fruit garden (peaches, nuts, etc) and a lot of interesting and new plans, which he hopes to realize with the help of Kiva lenders. 

He is asking for a loan of 1.000.000 Armenian drams in order to establish a big garden on his plot of land where he will plant currants. He mentions that in their district, he will be the only farmer who will have such a garden.

loans.use: to purchase materials to establish a big garden to plant currants

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary, 46 years old, is from Olkalou. She is married to Peter who produces some additional income for the family and together they are blessed with seven children aged 16, 12, 10, 8, 6, 4 and 2 years old.

She is a cereal and groceries seller; a business she has been carrying out for the last five years. She sells cereals like beans, dry maize, green grams, peanuts and groceries. To enable her to add more stock of these goods, she has applied for her second loan of KSHS 40,000 from Kadet Ltd.

Her monthly income right now is KSHS 30,000 and she plans to use the profits from her expanded business to educate her children and to expand her cereals business.

Mary looks forward to owning the largest cereal store in her area in the near future.

loans.use: To buy more cereals and groceries to sell

loans.name: Bintiabed

texts.en:
Bintiabed has been operating a clothes-selling business to support her family from the profit she gets. She sells to town dwellers, passersby, and neighbors. She faces the major challenge of inflation in her business. 

With the KSHS 40,000, she wants to purchase three bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase three bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Jose Leonel

texts.es: José de 39  años de edad, habita junto a su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos. Desde hace 5 años se dedica a prestar servicios de seguridad en un hotel de su municipio. De esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Tiene 21 años de habitar en su humilde casa la cual desea mejorarle el techo que con  el tiempo se ha dañado y es necesario hacer el cambio lo antes posible. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos. Espera poder contar con este apoyo que tanto necesita para darle mayor estabilidad a su familia.
texts.en:
José is 39 years old, he lives with his wife and his two small children. For the past 5 years he has worked as a security guard in a hotel in the town where he lives. In this way he earns his family's sustenance. 

He has lived in his humble home for the past 21 years, and he wishes to improve the roof. Over time, the roof has been damaged and he needs to change it as soon as possible. 

For this reason he is requesting this loan from FUSAI, so that he can invest it in purchasing sheets of galvanized metal, wood and nails. José hopes he'll be able to count with much needed support, which will enable him to provide his family with greater stability.

loans.use: to purchase sheets of galvanized metal, wood and nails in order to repair the roof of his house

loans.name: Elvia Guadalupe

texts.es: Elvia de 44 años de edad es madre soltera de dos hijos. Habita en casa humilde pero propia que con mucho esfuerzo ha construido junto a sus hijos. Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de gallinas y pollos dentro de su lugar de residencia. Desea reparar las condiciones de las paredes de su casa que por el momento son de plástico y no le dan la seguridad adecuada cuando llueve y cuando hay viento. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para hacer la reparación de las paredes lo antes posible y así dar mayor seguridad a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elvia is 44 years old and she is the single mother of two children. She lives in a humble house of her own which she and her children worked really hard to build.

Elvia works raising and selling chickens and she keeps them in her home. She hopes to improve the condition of the walls in her home. At the moment her walls are made of plastic and do not provide adequate security when it rains or if its windy. 

She requests this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of sheets of galvanized metal, wood and nails in order to make repairs to the walls of her home as soon as possible and in this way improve the safety of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sheets of galvanized metal, wood and nails in order to repair the walls in her home

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 45 years old and is from Olkalou. He is married to Joyce, who is a farmer, and they are blessed with four children, aged 15, 11, 8 and 2 years,  three of whom are in school.

John is a farmer who practices mixed farming--that is, he grows different types of crops and is also a dairy farmer. He has been running this business for the past eight years. His monthly income right now is 15,000 KES. 

To enable him to buy a heifer and to hire laborers to work on his farm, John has applied for his first loan from Kadet Ltd., for 30,000 KES. He intends to use the profits from his expanded business to pay school fees for his children, buy another heifer and start poultry farming.

His hope and dream for the future is to live in prosperity.

loans.use: To buy a heifer and to hire laborers to work on his farm

loans.name: Issa

texts.en:
Issa is 42 years old and lives in the town of Bungokho in the Mbale region of Uganda. He is married and has three children. For the past 15 years, Issa has been working hard to manage his retail shop, which sells sugar, soap and salt. 

To help expand his business, Issa has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more items to sell in his shop, and will help Issa to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. Issa hopes that in the future he will be able to increase his stock. 

Issa is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program. The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Issa who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in his shop

loans.name: Tomenou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe TOMENOU est composé de trois personnes, qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Falila (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 37 ans. Falila n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Falila est mariée à un commerçant du nom de Issa. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Falila vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les diverses charges de la famille sont supportées par Falila et son mari. Pour ce faire, Falila vend des noix de colas et de l’arachide grillé de façon ambulante depuis quinze ans. Falila s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. En vue de renforcer son activité Falila s’associe aux autres membres du groupe TOMENOU pour solliciter un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Tomenou group consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of this group, Falila (the one raising her hand on the photo), is 37 years old.

Falila did not attend school. She married a merchant named Issa. The couple has three children, all in school and who are their dependents. Falila lives with her ​​husband and children. Various family expenses are borne by Falila and her husband. 

To make ends meet, Falila has been selling cola nuts and roasted peanuts as an itinerant vendor for the past fifteen years. She resupplies in one of Benin's  markets.

In order to strengthen her activity Faleela joins the other members of the Tomenou group in requesting a loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: buy cola nuts and peanuts

loans.name: Ayaba Adrienne's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes, qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Ayaba Adrienne (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 60 ans. Ayaba Adrienne n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Ayaba Adrienne est mariée à un certain Victor. Le couple a huit enfants, tous scolarisés et deux à leur charge. Ayaba Adrienne vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les diverses charges de la famille sont supportées par le couple. Pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille, Ayaba Adrienne pratique le maraîchage dans sa région depuis environ quarante- un ans. En vue de renforcer son activité Ayaba Adrienne s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe pour solliciter un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This group consists of three persons who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, Ayaba Adrienne (the one raising her hand on the photo), is 60 years old.

Ayaba Adrienne did not attend school. She is married to Victor. The couple has eight children, all having attended school, and of whom two are their dependents. Ayaba Adrienne lives with her ​​husband and children. Various family expenses are borne by her and her husband.

To meet her family's needs, Ayaba Adrienne has been gardening fresh produce in her region for the past 41 years. To strengthen her activity Ayaba Adrienne joins the other members of her group in requesting a loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: buy grains for planting

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane has a cereal shop in Naivasha town and has been in the business for three years. She is 33 years old and is married to Patrick, and together they are blessed with two children, who are in school.

This is Jane's first loan term from KADET Ltd. She plans to use the amount to buy more stock of maize and beans for her business. She will use the income generated to pay school fees for her children. 

She hopes to expand her retail business to a wholesale shop in the near future.

loans.use: To buy maize and beans.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Señora. María está realizando su cuarto crédito a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del grupo de crédito Mujeres con Visión,  vive por la comunidad de Llacao en la ciudad de Cuenca, este sector se encuentra rodeado de mucha belleza natural, su gente es tradicionalista y aun guarda celosamente la cultura que sus padres les inculcaron, laboran en la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.
La Señora María tiene 51 años de edad, está divorciada pero en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos son casados y viven independiente, sus cuatro hijos solteros trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, la casa en la que vive es propia.
Doña María desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de frutas y de comida típica como es el hornado y la fritada, en su casa se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos, todas estas actividades le permiten tener su solvencia económica y sacar adelante a sus hijos. Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de pollos para incrementar este negocio así como en alimento para animales. Su meta es comprarse un vehículo para su negocio.
texts.en:
María is taking out her fourth loan alongside her friends and partners from the loan group Mujeres con Visión (Women With Vision). She lives in the community of Llacao in the city of Cuenca. This region is surrounded by a lot of natural beauty. Its people are traditional and still zealously hold on to the culture that their parents instilled in them. They work in agriculture, raising animals, and business.

María is 51 years old. She is divorced, but has 7 older children from her marriage. Three of them are married and live independently. Her four single children work and help her out economically. The house that she lives in belongs to her. 

For 8 years, María has worked selling fruits and traditional food, such as hornado (whole roast pig) and fritada (a traditional fried pork dish). At home, she raises chickens and pigs. All these activities allow her to maintain herself economically and get her children ahead. 

She is going to invest her loan in the purchase of chickens to expand her business, as well as in animal feed. Her goal is to buy a vehicle for her business.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is married and blessed with two children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Mariam cooks food in a café, which she sells to town dwellers and passersby. She cites her major business challenge as food leftovers that lead to losses. She dreams of establishing a hotel business in the future.

With the 50,000 KES she wants to purchase ingredients such as beans, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as beans, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil.

loans.name: Cica Célestine Sophie's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Cica Célestine Sophie (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 48 ans. Cica Célestine Sophie a très peu fréquenté l’école. Cica Célestine Sophie est mariée à un certain Ethienne. Le couple a cinq enfants, dont certains scolarisés et trois à leur charge. Cica Célestine Sophie vit avec ses enfants. Les charges du ménage sont supportées par le couple. Pour ce faire, Cica Célestine Sophie vend du gari (farine fait à base de manioc) et du maïs à son domicile depuis une vingtaine d'années. Cica Célestine Sophie s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Cica Célestine Sophie s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This group consists of three persons from the same neighborhood. The representative of this group, Cica Celestine Sophie (the one raising her hand on the photo), is 48 years old.

Cica Celestine Sophie has had very little schooling. She is married to Ethienne. The couple has five children, of whom three attend school and three are their dependents. Cica Celestine Sophie lives with her children. Various family expenses are borne by the couple.

To make ends meet, Cica Celestine Sophie has been selling gari (flour made ​​from cassava) and corn out of her home for the past twenty years. She resupplies in one of Benin's markets.

In order to strengthen her activity Cica Celestine Sophie joins the other members of her group in requesting a first loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: Buy gari (flour made ​​from cassava) and corn.

loans.name: Victoire's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Victoire (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 35 ans. Victoire n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Victoire est mariée à un éleveur du nom de Hubert. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés, et aucun a sa charge. Victoire vit seule. Dans le but de répondre à ses besoins, Victoire vend des condiments dans sa région depuis dix ans. Victoire s'approvisionne dans sa région. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Victoire s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This group consists of three persons who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, Victoire (the one raising her hand on the photo) is 35 years old.

Victoire did not attend school. She is married to a farmer named Hubert. The couple has three children, all in school, none of whom are dependents. Victory lives alone.

In order to meet her needs, Victoire has been selling condiments in her region for the past ten years. She resupplies in her region.

In order to strengthen her business, Victoire joins the other members of her group in requesting a first loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: buy condiments

loans.name: Lucrecia Leonor

texts.es:
La Señora Lucrecia desde hace un año y medio forma parte del grupo de crédito Mujeres con Visión, vive por la ciudad de Cuenca lugar que goza de una belleza natural y arquitectónica, esta bañada por 4 ríos, esta ciudad es cuna de grandes artistas y deportistas, su gente al igual que las socias son amables, gentiles y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones que sus padres le inculcaron.
La Señora Lucrecia tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 14 y 2 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en el colegio, su esposo es de profesión pintor, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Doña Lucrecia desde hace 4 años se dedica a su propio negocio que es la venta de pañales, trabaja desde su casa de lunes a sábados, le gusta este negocio ya que le da la oportunidad de  estar ha lado de sus hijos. El dinero de su crédito va a ser invertido en la compra de pañales para su negocio. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Lucrecia joined the loan group Mujeres con Visión (Women With Vision) a year and a half ago. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a place that boasts of natural beauty and architecture. It is bordered by 4 rivers. This city is a cradle of great artists and athletes. Its people, just like the group members, are friendly, courteous, and still maintain the culture and traditions that their parents instilled. 

Lucrecia is 33 years old. She is married, and from her union, she has 2 children ages 14 and 2 years. Her first daughter is in high school. Her husband is a painter; they don’t have their own house because they rent.

For 4 years, Lucrecia has worked in her own business of selling diapers. She works from home Monday through Saturday. She enjoys this business because it gives her the opportunity to be with her children. The money from her loan is going to be invested in the purchase of diapers for her business. 

Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: to purchase diapers.

loans.name: Daysi Yanira

texts.es: Daysi de 37 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa (faldas, blusas, pantalones, ropa interior, etc.) de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su comunidad. Es muy trabajadora y visionaria. Desea hacerle mejoras al techo de su vivienda ya que no se encuentra en buenas condiciones por causa del sol, las lluvias, y el tiempo. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos que son los materiales necesarios para hacer el cambio de techo.
texts.en:
Daysi is 37 years old. She lives in her own house with her family, which is made up of her life partner and their four children. She works as a street vendor selling clothing (such as skirts, blouses, trousers, underwear, etc.) in the principal zones of her community. Daysi is very hard-working and has a lot of vision.

She wishes to improve the roof of her home, which is in poor condition due to the effects of sun, rain, and time. She is seeking this credit from FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails, which are the materials needed for the change of roof.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Dorothée's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Dorothée (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 44 ans. Dorothée n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Dorothée est mariée à un mécanicien- chauffeur nommé Raphaël. Le couple a deux enfants, dont un à leur charge. Aucun de ces enfants n'est scolarisé. Dorothée vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les différentes charges de ménage sont supportées par Dorothée et son mari. Pour ce faire, Dorothée vend des fournitures de couture et du charbon de bois à son domicile depuis vingt cinq ans. Dorothée s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son fonds de roulement, Dorothée s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This group consists of three people from the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, Dorothée (the one raising her hand on the photo) is 44 years old. Dorothée did not attend school.

She is married to a mechanic-driver named Raphael. The couple has two children, of whom one is their dependent. None of the children attend school. Dorothée lives with her ​​husband and children. Various household expenses are borne by Dorothée and her husband. 

To make ends meet, Dorothée has been selling sewing supplies and charcoal from her home for the past  twenty-five years. She resupplies in one of Benin's markets.

To strengthen her capital, Dorothée joins other members of her group in requesting a first loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: buy sewing supplies and charcoal

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice live in New Kru town. She is 47 years old, single and has three children between 18 and 21 years old. For the past six years, she has been selling cookies in the local market. She started this business with a loan from her friend and she learned this way of selling from her friends. She sells for eight hours per day from Monday to Saturday. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cookies for her business. She plans to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more cookies for her business.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen has a business selling livestock in Naivasha town and has been in the business for 23 years. He is 53 years old, married and blessed with three children who are in school.

This is his third loan from KADET LTD and he plans to use the loan to buy goats and sheep for sale. He will use the generated income to pay school fees for his children and buy more livestock.

In the near future, he hopes to become the largest livestock dealer in Naivasha.

loans.use: To buy goats and sheep to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To grow his mobile money transfers business and serve more customers in need of financial services

loans.name: Laretta

texts.en: Laretta live in New Kru town. She is 35 years old and single with three children between 8 and 13 years old. All her children are in school and live at home. For the past three years, she has been selling bread. She started this business by selling rice around the communities with the small amount of goods she could afford. She learned this way of selling from her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more bread for her business. Her plan is to expand her business and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more bread for her business

loans.name: Elsa Avelina

texts.es:
La Señora. Elsa forma parte del grupo comunal Mujeres con Visión desde hace 2 años, en este tiempo ha llegado a mantener una muy buena relación de amistad con todas sus compañeras del grupo, vive por la comunidad de Llacao en la ciudad de Cuenca, este sector se encuentra rodeado de mucha belleza natural, su gente es tradicionalista y aun guarda celosamente la cultura que sus padres les inculcaron, laboran en la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.
La Señora. Elsa tiene 35 años de edad, se encuentra casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 13, 12 y 2 años, su primera hija está en el colegio y su segunda hija estudia en una escuelita de la localidad, su esposo es chofer profesional y labora conduciendo camiones pesados, la casa en la que vive es propia.
Doña Elsa desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y le va muy bien, también se dedica a la crianza de pollos, vacas, cerdos y gallinas de postura, la agricultura es solo para el consumo de su hogar. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cerdos y también en materiales de construcción para el mejoramiento de su vivienda. Su meta es terminar su casa y agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
Elsa has been part of the communal bank Mujeres con Vision for the past 2 years. During this time she has formed some very good friendly relationships with all the other members of the group. She lives in the Llacao community in Cuenca city. This area is surrounded by much natural beauty, the people there are traditionalists and still jealously maintain the culture their parents instilled in them. Most work in agriculture, raising animals and commerce. 

Elsa is 35 years old, she is married and the fruits of her marital union are 3 children of 13. 12 and 2 years of age. Her oldest daughter is in middle school and her second daughter studies in a small local school. Elsa's husband is a professional driver and he works driving heavy trucks. She owns the house where she lives.

For the past 3 years Elsa has been selling cosmetics for a living and she's doing very well. She also works raising chickens, cows, pigs and egg-laying hens but this agricultural work is only for her household's consumption.

She will use her new loan to purchase chickens, pigs and construction materials in order to improve her home. Her goal is to complete her house and to increase her business.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, pigs and construction materials

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia es una madre de familia de 43 años de edad que vive junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, un distrito que se dedica a la agricultura, pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo y se encuentra ubicada en la región de Lambayeque.

Se dedica desde hace más de 12 años a la venta de productos de uso doméstico en su propio domicilio, cubriendo así la demanda de sus clientes que a la vez son sus vecinos.

Este negocio le está permitiendo mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, por lo que Celia necesita ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos que le permitan ampliar la cobertura de su negocio. Por este motivo ha solicitado un crédito de 1 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Cabe resaltar que Celia confía en Edpyme Alterntiva ya que anteriormente se le ha otorgado créditos para su negocio.
texts.en:
Celia is a 43-year-old mother. She lives with her husband and children in Cayaltí, a district dominated by agriculture in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region.

For more than 12 years she has worked selling products for everyday domestic use from her own home, thereby meeting the needs of her customers who are at the same time her neighbours. 

This business is enabling Celia to improve her family's quality of life. In order to continue she needs to expand her business by buying more merchandise, and so improve her range of products. For this reason she has sought a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles, which will help her to achieve her goal. 

Importantly, Celia trusts in Edpyme Alternativa as they have previously made her loans for her business.

loans.use: to buy products for domestic use.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph has a transport business in Naivasha and has been in the business for three years. He is 25 years old and married to Helen. Together, they are blessed with one child.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD and he plans to use the loan to buy a motorbike. He will use the generated income to expand his charcoal business.

In the near future, he hopes to own a taxi.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Georgina's Group

texts.en:
This group is made up of five members, all women, who are responsible for their families. They are from Teshie, which is located in the coastal zone of the country. These people are characterized by being hard working, responsible, and wanting to excel. Unfortunately, due to the lack of enough economic resources, they were not able to study and were obligated to work from a young age in order to help with the household expenses. They are into the sales of tomatoes, slippers, cookies, toothbrushes and toothpaste. 

Georgina has been selling toothbrushes and toothpaste for six years. She does this work eight hours daily on foot. The objective of the loan is to purchase and sell toothbrushes and toothpaste so that in the not too distant future, she can obtain a better income. ID-Ghana is appreciated for the support of the Kiva investors that provide to these people. They will need a total loan of GHS 4,200 to buy and sell enough to mobilize profit.

loans.use: To buy toothpaste and toothbrushes to sell .

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice lives and works in St. Paul.  St. Paul is home to the oldest market in Liberia and is known for fish, due to its location by the sea.  St. Paul is a suburb located just outside Monrovia, past the free port.  It is one of the poorer areas and you will often find its residents living in sub-standard housing. 

Alice is 41 years old and married with six children. Her children are out of high school and live at home. For the past 10 years, she has been operating a small table market where she sells spareribs, and pig's feet. She started this business by selling dried fish around her community with the small amount of goods she could afford. She learned this way of selling from her friends. She is requesting a loan to purchase spareribs and pig's feet for her business. Her plan is to expand her business even more.

loans.use: to purchase spareribs and pigs feet

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es:
Elvira vive junto a su esposo e hijos en su casa propia en el distrito de Cayaltí una zona que se dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería a una hora de la provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la región Lambayeque en la parte norte del Perú.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral, cuyes y carneros, además percibe ingresos por mototaxi de su esposo y labores agrícolas que ambos realizan.

Ella ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados de crianza y engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlo al público, con las ganancias que se obtengan podrá cubrir el pago de los estudios de su hijo.
texts.en:
Elvira lives with her husband and children in her own home in the district of Cayaltí. This is an area dedicated to trade, agriculture, and livestock farming, about an hour from Chiclayo City. It is part of the Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region in the north of Peru.

Elvira works rearing and selling poultry, guinea pigs, and sheep. She also receives income from her husband's motorcycle taxi, and agricultural laboring work that they both carry out.

She has sought a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles to buy balanced feed to rear and fatten her animals, and so offer them for sale to the public. With the earnings she will make she will be able to pay for her son's studies.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Edilberto tiene 65 años de edad, es casado vive junto a su esposa y una hija en el distrito de Cayaltí una comunidad dedicada a la ganadería, agricultura y comercio perteneciente a la provincia de Chiclayo en la Región Lambayeque en la costa del Perú.

Su familia se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral y carneros, además percibe ingresos como dependiente de la municipalidad de Cayalti.

El necesita un crédito de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de carneros lo que le permitirá tener variedad de animales para ofrecer al público y generar ingresos para una mejora la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Edilberto is 65 years old, married, and lives with his wife and one daughter in the Cayalti district, a community devoted to cattle raising, agriculture, and trade. It is part of Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region on the coast of Peru.

His family is in the business of raising and selling poultry and sheep. They also receive an income as dependents of the Cayalti municipality.

He needs a loan of 500 PEN to buy lambs, which will allow him to offer a variety of animals for public sale and will generate income, so he can improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animals

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 50 años de edad vive junto a su esposo no tienen hijos dependientes, reside en su casa propia en el caserío Cruz verde una comunidad pequeña dedicada a la agricultura y crianza de ganado mayor y menor del distrito Matanza, provincia Morropon de la región Piura una zona norte del Perú.

Se dedica a la venta de carne, cerveza y comida, tiene una pequeña bodega con su cónyuge además poseen 03 Has de terreno agrícola en el sector Loma Negra de Pabur viejo donde tiene sembrado 02 Ha de Maíz A.D recién sembrado negocio del cual tiene más de 10 años de antigüedad, tiene su ramada en su casa y bodega y vende comida en el fundo el Iqueño.

Santos es un cliente recurrente a Edpyme Alternativa y cuenta con un buen historial crediticio y ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para asistir a su cultivo sembrado y darle un manejo adecuado y oportuno para obtener mejor rendimiento.
texts.en:
Santos is 50 years old; she lives with her husband; she does not have dependent children.  She lives in her own home in the small village of Cruz Verde, which is a small community dedicated to farming and ranching in the district of Matanza, which is in the Morropon Province of the region of Piura in northern Peru. 

She sells meat, beer, and prepared food for a living.  She has a small grocery store with her partner and they also have 3 ha of farmland in the Loma Negra area of Pabur Viejo where they have planted 2 ha of corn.  She has had that business for over ten years.  She has a restaurant area and her grocery store in her house and she sells prepared food at a farm called El Iqueño. 

Santos is a returning customer of Edpyme Alternativa and she has a good credit history and she is asking for a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to help with her crop and give it the care it needs to obtain the best yield.

loans.use: to improve her crops

loans.name: Luz Margarita

texts.es:
Luz Margarita tiene 68 años de edad es madre soltera, con hijos independientes, vive en la zona rural del distrito de Oyotun, a 1 hora con 45 minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo de la región Lambayeque que se encuentra ubicado en la parte norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a hacer curaciones y trabajos de prótesis dental, con muchos años de experiencia en este rubro, su consultorio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio y solicita un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para invertir en compra de material para su trabajo y de esta manera poder tener más clientes.
texts.en:
Luz Margarita, 68, is a single mother with independent children.  She lives in the rural area of the district of Oyotun, an hour and 45 minutes from the province of Chiclayo in the region of Lambayeque in northern Peru.

She earns a living doing dental work and making prostheses and has several years of experience in this sector.  Her clinic is set up in her home.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1,000 PEN to buy supplies for her work so she can attend to more clients.

loans.use: To buy dental supplies.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas tiene 49 años de edad, es viuda y reside junto a su familia en el caserío Chorrillos del distrito de Cayalluc, una zona rural perteneciente a la región Cajamarca. La zona está ubicada en la sierra norte del Perú, es una de las zonas más pobres y frías de la región. Sus pobladores se dedican principalmente a actividades agrícolas.

Se dedica al cultivo de caña de azúcar y procesamiento de aguardiente, un licor derivado de la caña de azúcar a través de un proceso de destilación artesanal. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 18 años. Una vez cosechada, la caña de azúcar es ingresada en una herramienta denominada "trapiche", en la cual se tritura el vegetal para obtener productos como el aguardiente y la "chancaca" (azúcar sin procesar.

Felicitas se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en el mantenimiento de sus equipos de destilación de aguardiente, así como costear gastos para peones en su cultivo de caña. Con el crédito quiere invertir parte en la comprar piezas de su trapiche que se encuentran desgastadas así como de su equipo de destilación. Teniendo un equipo mejor habilitado podrá destilar mayor cantidad de aguardiente.
texts.en:
Felicitas, 49, is a widow and lives with her family in the rural area of Chorrillos in the district of Cayalluc.  The area belongs to the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountain range of Peru, one of the coldest and poorest areas of the region.  The local people are involved mainly in agricultural activities.

Felicitas grows sugar cane and turns it into a liquor through an artistan distillery process.  She has been in the business for 18 years.  The sugar cane is milled with an instrument called a "trapiche" which grinds the pulp down into "chancaca" (unprocessed sugar) and liquor.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1,000 PEN to pay for maintenance of her distillery equipment and also pay the workers for cultivating the sugar cane.  With the loan she will buy spare parts for both the mill and the distillery equipment.   If she keeps the equipment in better condition she will be able to produce more liquor.

loans.use: To buy parts for her sugar cane mill and distillery.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, comenta que ella viene de una familia muy trabajadora y humilde, vive con su mama, tías y primos.
Comenta que su meta es salir adelante, ser una buena profesional y poder ayudar así a su familia. Ella está estudiando la carrera de Administración de empresas con lo que quiere sobresalir y ser la mejor profesional.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar las cuotas de su universidad, y así seguir con su meta de ser una buena profesional. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Lourdes is from the city of Ybycuí.  She tells us that she comes from a very hardworking, humble family.  She lives with her mom, her aunts, and her cousins.  

She tells us that her goal is to get ahead, be a real professional, and be able to help her family.  She is studying business administration, which she hopes will set her apart and make her the best professional.  

She is asking for this loan to pay her university fees so she can keep working toward her goal of becoming a real professional.  She is thankful for the opportunity she is receiving, which will help her a great deal.

loans.use: to pay her university fees

loans.name: Esmeraldas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESMERALDAS”  iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Jovana es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: lavado de arena, electricista, venta de comida, venta de pollo, venta de CD’s, costura de prendas, tienda de barrio

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Jovana es integrante, ella indica que hace tres ciclos que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de lavado y venta de arena; este negocio lo aprendió de sus padres, ya que era un negocio familiar,  posterior a tener su hijo decide hacer su negocio independiente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de herramientas) que adquirirá de las tiendas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará a solicitud del cliente. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los consultorios de salud.
texts.en:
The Esmeraldas Communal Bank is starting its second cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the regional hub of Collpani.  It is made up of eight members and it is governed by a board of directors, of which Jovana is president.  The communal bank members' businesses differ and include sand cleaning, electrical work, food sales, chicken sales, CD sales, garment sewing, and running a corner store.  

The loan they are taking out will benefit small businesswomen, one of whom is Jovana.  She tells us that she has been with Pro Mujer for three cycles after joining on the invitation of a friend who is a member of the institution.  She currently has a business cleaning and selling sand.  She learned this business from her parents, as it was a family business, and after having her son she decided to start her own business.  

The loan she is currently taking out is to increase her capital to buy tools that she will get from the stores in the city of El Alto and later sell upon request to her customers.  This way of working allows her to generate the income to support her household as best she can as she is single and has a son.    
 
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she tells us that she likes the health clinics.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa Elvira tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera, cuenta con 2 hijos en su poder de edades 17 y 14 años, de los cuales los dos cursan secundaria en colegio nacional del distrito de Pucará, vive en casa propia de material rustico, natural de la zona, cuenta con buenas referencias personales y económicas. Vive en la parte rural de este distrito contando con servicios de agua y luz.

La actividad que realiza es la venta de pescados y mariscos frescos, cuenta con negocio propio ubicado en el mercado de abastos Pucará, tiene 3 años de experiencia en esta actividad, contando con clientela estable.

Rosa Elvira se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 500 nuevos soles. El destino del crédito sera para invertir en su negocio comprando pescado y mariscos surtiendo su negocio con nuevos productos, con ello le generara mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa Elvira, 43, is a single mother with two children, ages 17 and 14, who attend the public secondary school in the district of Pucará.  She lives in her own rustic home and has good personal and credit references.  The rural district she lives in has running water and electricity.

For three years, Rosa Elvira has been operating her own fish and seafood stand at the wholesale market in Pucará, where she has a stable clientele.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 500 PEN to invest in her business.  She plans to buy new products for her fish and seafood business, hoping to increase her income and improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fish and seafood for her business.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Leonardo tiene 45 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene cuatro hijos de 11,6,4 y 3 años de edad, el mayor cursa educación primaria en colegio nacional del distrito de San Felipe, cliente vive en casa propia de material rustico desde hace 12 años, cuenta con buenas referencias personales y económicas. Vive en la parte rural de este distrito contando con servicios de agua y luz.

Se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general contando con una bodega ubicada en el caserío de Chafan, donde cuenta con clientela reconocida de la zona siendo la única bodega, ademas se dedica a brindar servicio de vacunación de animales (en apoyo a los ganaderos de la zona), así como también al cultivo de lima ingresos que le permiten solventar los gastos familiares.

Leonardo se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles, el destino del crédito sera para invertir en su negocio surtiendo con nuevos productos, con ello le generara mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Leonardo, 45, and his common-law wife have four children, ages 11, 6, 4 and 3.  The oldest son attends the national primary school in the district of San Felipe.  The borrower has lived in his own rustic home for 12 years and has good personal and credit references.  The area he lives in has running water and electricity.

Leonardo runs a grocery store in the rural area of Chafan where he is well-known as it is the only store in the area.  He also provides an animal vaccination service (supporting the livestock farmers in the area) and grows limes to earn extra income for the family.

He is requesting a loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN to invest in his business.  He wants to buy new products in an aim to increase his income and improve his lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy more products for his store.

loans.name: Marcelle's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Marcelle (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 46 ans. Marcelle n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Marcelle est mariée à un certain Gérard. Le couple a quatre enfants. Aucun des enfants n'est scolarisé et tous sont à leur charge. Marcelle vit avec ses enfants. Les différentes charges de ménage sont supportées par Marcelle et son mari. Pour ce faire, Marcelle vend divers produits et de la nourriture à son domicile depuis trente ans. Marcelle s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son fonds de roulement, Marcelle s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The group's representative is the woman raising her hand in the photograph. Her name is Marcelle, she's 46 years old and married to one Gérard. They have four children, whom they have to support. None of them attend school.

Marcelle never went to school. She lives with her children, and takes care of the household expenses with her husband. To do so, she's been selling various products and food at her home for thirty years. She gets her supplies in a market in Benin.

Eager to bolster her working capital, Marcelle, together with the other members of the group, is seeking a first loan from Kiva's partner, ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy various products food

loans.name: Blandine Afiavi Sèonmian's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Blandine Afiavi Sèonmian(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 34 ans. Blandine Afiavi Sèonmian n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Blandine Afiavi Sèonmian est mariée à un certain Éric. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Blandine Afiavi Sèonmian vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les différentes charges de ménage sont supportées par Blandine Afiavi Sèonmian et son mari.
